sentences.en: All round the table, the gentlemen looked unimpeachable in the extreme.
sentences.cn: 这些绅士们围着桌子坐着, 样子都极端地无可非议.

sentences.en: And that she had been told by the most unimpeachable source: his mother.
sentences.cn: 告诉她这一情况的,原来就是他的母亲.

sentences.en: He said all five were men of unimpeachable character.
sentences.cn: 他说这五个都是品格完美无缺的人。

sentences.en: I have it on unimpeachable authority.
sentences.cn: 我从绝对可靠的权威处获悉该消息.

sentences.en: It is the revenge that nature takes on persons of unimpeachable character.
sentences.cn: 这是自然对人品无瑕的人的报复.

sentences.en: Their actions are selfless and unimpeachable.
sentences.cn: 他们的行动是无私的,是无可指责的.
这是市场规律, 无可指责.

sentences.en: When toned down again , the unimpeachable patriot appeared in the witness - box.
sentences.cn: 这阵喧哗过去, 那无懈可击的爱国志士已经登上了证人席.

sentences.en: Willoughby Pattern is a man of unimpeachable honour.
sentences.cn: 威洛比·帕忒恩是个无可指责的高尚的人.

sentences.en: Your testimony on this matter is hardly unimpeachable.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上你的辩驳很难说是无懈可击的.

words.tran_cn: 无可指责地；无懈可击地
无可指责的；无可怀疑的；无懈可击的；无过失的，无罪的

trans.tran_cn: 无可指责的，无可怀疑的，可靠的
trans.tran_en: so good or definite that criticism or doubt is impossible
